title: Can someone tell me where Bembo is used??
content: I have a typography project to do, and I need to make a mood board with photos of places, or things that use Bembo, and I can't find anything that has Bembo on it....Please help me...
author: mario234

comments.content:
For specific samples, you'll have to look around the website.

[http://www.callutheran.edu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100327045259/http:/www.callutheran.edu/ "http://www.callutheran.edu/")
If you serach for 'bembo' on images.google.com you'll find loads of examples...
